theme: International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
entities: International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
summary: The Security Council, recalling resolution 1504 (2003), and Article 16 (4) of the Statute of the International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia, decides to extend the appointment of Ms. Carla Del Ponte as Prosecutor for a final period from 15 September 2007 to 31 December 2007, to ensure a smooth transition before her successor assumes office, notwithstanding the provisions of article 16 (4) of the Statute.
